title: Kensa Splat Roller
paragraphs: The Kensa Splat Roller is a main weapon in Splatoon 2. It is a Toni Kensa-branded variant of the Splat Roller.

The Kensa Splat Roller shares its overall design with the Splat Roller. However, the Kensa Splat Roller is black and white with the Toni Kensa signature red clothespin attached to moving part of the handle. Unlike the Splat Roller, the ink reservoir of the Kensa Splat Roller does not change with the user's ink color and is always white.
The Kensa Splat Roller was released on 14 September 2018 at 02:00 UTC. It comes with Splat Bomb and Bubble Blower.
- An Inkling boy with Kensa Splat Roller.
